response.overview: Although necessary, replacing body parts is the ultimate dangerous endeavor. Olga hates it. The mood swings, the high probability of rejection, and, worse of them all: Human connection. A new eye sets Olga on a collision path with an old-as-time organization and a scientist on the fringe of discovering a new revolutionary drug.
response.tagline: “Olga is a construct. Frankenstein, Bella Baxter, Sally; Olga. Not as sociable as the video demonstrated.” - Observer.
response.title: Olga
